<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name/>=<value> Game
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.66</value></part><part><name>Game Version</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>global  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>global  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server </value></part><part><name>Exec</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapons </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets vehicle and instigator pair for the given projectile. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> projectile [[setShotParents]] [vehicle, instigator] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> projectile: [[Object]] - the actual projectile shot </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [vehicle, instigator]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - Vehicle shooting projectile</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> instigator: [[Object]] - Person pulling the trigger </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myProjectile [[setShotParents]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[vehicle]] bob, bob];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>tank [[addEventHandler]] ["Fired", {_this [[select]] 6 [[setShotParents]] [tank, [[commander]] tank]}];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[getShotParents]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
